text: Alfredo David Moreno (12 January 1980 â€“ 8 December 2021) was an Argentine- Mexican footballer. He played as a forward. He was known for playing for Club Necaxa between 2003 until 2006, making 132 appearances. Moreno died from stomach cancer on 8 December 2021 at a hospital in Aguascalientes City, Mexico, at the age of 41. ==References== ==Other websites== *Guardian statistics *Argentine Primera statistics Category:1980 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Argentine footballers Category:Mexican footballers Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:Deaths from stomach cancer
title: Alfredo Moreno
